headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Armory Bonuses and Discounts
content:
Anyone who has unlocked and purchased an Agency Weapon Finish from the Agencyâ€™s Armory by completing Payphone Hits, Short Trips, and helping Dr. Dre sort out his data leak will receive a lump-sum bonus to the tune of GTA$200K, delivered within 72 hours of completion.

Upgrading your Agency with an Armory, meanwhile, is 30% off, as is all the exclusive weaponry available therein.
